value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: Manage cloud resources
value.excerpt: The second learning path in a course on Cloud Administration from Carnegie Mellon University. Learn more about how the cloud works by exploring its underlying technology of virtualization, how to take advantage of the cloud for scale, and how to automate cloud resource management.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

topItems.title: Automate cloud resource management
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Explore Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: Explore Microsoft Teams

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

value.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in pictures

value.title: Implement initial configuration of Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Implement initial configuration of Azure Active Directory

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

value.title: Orchestrate data movement and transformation in Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Orchestrate data movement and transformation in Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Find out about the Azure Batch capabilities designed to help you efficiently run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications in the cloud.

value.title: Get started with Rust
value.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Rust - set up the environment, write a program, and use the Cargo build system.

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

value.title: Build serverless APIs with Azure Functions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can build highly scalable serverless APIs with Azure Functions.  0:00 – Overview 1:09 – What "serverless" really means 4:00 – A closer look at Azure Functions 7:29 – Azure Functions Live Metrics 10:45 – Thinking downstream of Azure Functions 13:52 – Using

value.title: How to deploy your web app using GitHub Actions | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to deploy Azure web apps using GitHub Actions.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com    Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal    And make sure to keep an eye on our Azure Portal "How to"

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

value.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
value.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!
